title: Citrus Vinaigrette
ingredients: - ¾ cup orange juice (not from concentrate)
- ¼ cup fresh lime juice (2 to 3 limes)
- ¼ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Combine the orange and lime juices, basil, cilantro, salt, pepper, honey, and oil in a blender and blend for 1 minute. This can be made up to 8 hours in advance and refrigerated. Bring to room temperature before serving.
